text: Hot-springs with bacteria, cyanobacteria, and algae in Yellowstone National Park Thermophyte (Greek thérmos = warmth, heat + phyton = plant) is a plant which is tolerant or thriving at high temperatures. These plants are categorized according to ecological valences at high temperatures, including biological extremely. Such plants included the hot-spring taxa also.
